ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಕೆಲವು ಉತ್ತಮ ಪುಸ್ತಕಗಳು ಇಲ್ಲಿವೆ:

1. "ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸ" ಎಂಬ ಪುಸ್ತಕವನ್ನು ಬರೆದಿರುವ ಹೆನ್ರಿ ಅಡಮ್ಸ್ ಅವರು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ವಿವರಣೆ ನೀಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಪುಸ್ತಕವು 1787 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಕಟವಾಯಿತು ಮತ್ತು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸದ ಮೊದಲ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಪುಸ್ತಕವಾಗಿದೆ.

2. "ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸ: ಸಮಾಜ, ರಾಜಕೀಯ ಮತ್ತು ಸಾಂಸ್ಕೃತಿಕ ವಿಕಾಸ" ಎಂಬ ಪುಸ್ತಕವನ್ನು ಬರೆದಿರುವ ಬ್ರೂಸ್ ಎಲ್ಟನ್ ಅವರು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ವಿವರಣೆ ನೀಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಈ ಪುಸ್ತಕವು 2002 ರಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಕಟವಾಯಿತು ಮತ್ತು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ವಿವರಣೆ ನೀಡುವ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಪುಸ್ತಕಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಒಂದಾಗಿದೆ.

3. "ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ ಇತಿಹಾಸ: ಸಮಾಜ, ರಾಜಕೀಯ ಮತ್ತು ಸಾಂಸ್ಕೃತಿಕ ವಿಕಾಸ" ಎಂಬ ಪುಸ್ತಕವನ್ನು ಬರೆದಿರುವ ಜೆರಾಲ್ ಹ್ಯಾರಿಸ್ ಅವರು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾದ �

samples.prompt: Write a cover letter for a job in Ventura that is funny and would be enjoyed by someone named Darius, wrap the entire response in double quotation marks.
samples.response:
"Dear Hiring Manager at Ventura,

I'm Darius, the guy who's about to bring some much-needed laughter and excitement to your team. I'm not just applying for a job, I'm auditioning for the role of your new favorite colleague. With my impressive collection of dad jokes and an uncanny ability to make anyone smile, I'm confident that I'll be the perfect fit for your Ventura team.

As a highly skilled and slightly quirky individual, I bring a unique set of skills to the table. My expertise in procrastination, coffee-fueled productivity, and the art of taking three-hour lunches will undoubtedly make me a valuable asset to your team. My extensive experience in napping, playing video games, and binge-watching Netflix will also ensure that I'm always well-rested and ready to tackle any challenge that comes my way.

But don't just take my word for it – my friends and family will vouch for my exceptional people skills, my ability to eat an entire pizza by myself, and my uncanny talent for singing off-key in the shower. I'm a team player, a creative problem solver, and a master of the art of doing absolutely nothing.

In all seriousness, I'm excited about the opportunity to join your team and contribute my skills and experience to help drive success in Ventura. I'm a quick learner, a hard worker, and a passionate individual who is eager to make a difference.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my unique set of skills can benefit your team.

Sincerely,
Darius"

samples.prompt: Write a document entirely in the Portuguese language, no other language is allowed, about Adam and Eve. Additionally, make sure to wrap your entire response with double quotation marks.
samples.response:
"O Livro da Criação de Adão e Eva

No início, Deus criou o mundo e tudo o que nele existe. Ele criou o céu e a terra, as montanhas e os rios, os animais e as plantas. Mas Deus sabia que algo faltava, algo que completaria a criação perfeita. E assim, ele criou Adão e Eva, os primeiros seres humanos.

Adão foi criado do pó da terra, enquanto Eva foi criada a partir de uma das costelas de Adão. Deus os colocou no Jardim do Éden, um lugar de beleza e abundância, onde tudo era perfeito e puro.

Deus deu a Adão e Eva uma ordem: não comam da árvore da sabedoria, pois ela era proibida. Mas a serpente, que era astuta e enganosa, convenceu Eva a desobedecer a Deus. Ela disse que a árvore da sabedoria era boa para comer e que não haveria consequências. Eva, que estava curiosa e desobediente, comeu da árvore e, em seguida, deu um pedaço a Adão.

Quando Deus descobriu o que havia acontecido, ele ficou triste e decepcionado. Ele expulsou Adão e Eva do Jardim do Éden, pois eles haviam desobedecido a sua ordem. Eles foram forçados a viver fora do jardim, trabalhando duro para sobreviver.

Mas Deus não abandonou Adão e Eva. Ele os amava e os protegeu, e prometeu que um dia, um redentor viria para salvar a humanidade. E assim, a história de Adão e Eva se tornou a história da humanidade, uma história de amor, de pecado e de redenção.

A lenda de Adão e Eva continua a ser contada e recontada ao longo dos séculos, uma lembrança da criação e da queda do homem. E é uma história que nos lembra da importância da obediência e da fé, e da promessa de um Deus que nos ama e nos protege."

"

samples.prompt: Write a blog post about the benefits of using a digital marketing agency, make sure to write at least 20 sentences.
samples.response:
**The Benefits of Using a Digital Marketing Agency: Boosting Your Online Presence**

In today's digital age, having a strong online presence is crucial for businesses to succeed. With the ever-evolving landscape of digital marketing, it can be overwhelming to keep up with the latest trends and strategies. This is where a digital marketing agency comes in – a team of experts who can help you navigate the digital world and drive your business forward. In this blog post, we'll explore the benefits of using a digital marketing agency and why it's essential for your business to thrive.

**1. Expertise and Knowledge**

A digital marketing agency has a team of experts who have in-depth knowledge of the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and strategies. They stay up-to-date with the latest algorithms, platform updates, and industry developments, ensuring that your business stays ahead of the competition.

**2. Time-Saving**

By outsourcing your digital marketing efforts to a agency, you can free up time to focus on what you do best – running your business. A digital marketing agency will handle all aspects of your online marketing, from social media management to SEO and content creation.

**3. Increased Online Visibility**

A digital marketing agency can help increase your online visibility by creating and implementing a comprehensive digital marketing strategy that includes search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, and social media marketing.

**4. Targeted Advertising**

With a digital marketing agency, you can target your ideal audience with precision, increasing the effectiveness of your advertising efforts. By using data and analytics, they can identify your target audience and create campaigns that speak directly to them.

**5. Measurable Results**

A digital marketing agency can track and measure the success of your campaigns, providing you with valuable insights and data to inform future marketing decisions. This allows you to see the return on investment (ROI) of your marketing efforts and make data-driven decisions.

**6. Cost-Effective**

Hiring a digital marketing agency can be more cost-effective than hiring a full-time marketing team. You only pay for the services you need, and you can scale up or down as your business grows.

**7. Access to Advanced Tools and Technology**

A digital marketing agency has access to the latest tools and technology, including social media management software, SEO tools, and analytics platforms. This allows them to stay ahead of the competition and provide you with the best possible results.

**8. Improved Brand Awareness**

A digital marketing agency can help improve your brand awareness by creating engaging content, managing your social media presence, and developing a consistent brand voice.

**9. Increased Conversions**

By creating targeted campaigns and optimizing your website for conversions, a digital marketing agency can help increase the number of leads and sales generated from your website.

**10. Competitive Advantage**

A digital marketing agency can help you stay ahead of the competition by identifying areas of improvement and developing strategies to outperform your competitors.

**11. Flexibility**

A digital marketing agency can adapt to changes in the market and adjust your marketing strategy accordingly. This ensures that your business stays relevant and competitive in a rapidly changing digital landscape.

**12. Expert Content Creation**

A digital marketing agency can create high-quality, engaging content that resonates with your target audience. This includes blog posts, social media posts, email newsletters, and more.

**13. Social Media Management**

A digital marketing agency can manage your social media presence, creating and scheduling posts, responding to comments and messages, and monitoring engagement metrics.

**14. SEO Optimization**

A digital marketing agency can optimize your website for search engines, improving your search engine rankings and driving more organic traffic to your site.

**15. PPC Advertising**

A digital marketing agency can create and manage PPC campaigns, driving targeted traffic to your website and generating leads and sales.

**16. Email Marketing**

A digital marketing agency can create and send targeted email campaigns, nurturing leads and driving conversions.

**17. Data Analysis**

A digital marketing agency can analyze data and provide insights on your marketing efforts, helping you make informed decisions about your marketing strategy.

**18. Campaign Optimization**

A digital marketing agency can continuously optimize your campaigns, ensuring that they are performing at their best and driving the best possible results.

**19. Brand Consistency**

A digital marketing agency can help maintain a consistent brand voice and image across all online channels, ensuring that your brand is recognizable and memorable.

**20. Scalability**

A digital marketing agency can scale up or down as your business grows, ensuring that your marketing efforts are always aligned with your business goals.

**21. Expertise in Emerging Trends**

A digital marketing agency stays up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies, ensuring that your business is always ahead of the curve.

**22. Access to Industry Insights**

A digital marketing agency has access to industry insights and research, providing you with valuable information to inform your marketing decisions.

**23. Improved Customer Engagement**

A digital marketing agency can help improve customer engagement by creating engaging content and developing a customer-centric marketing strategy.

**24. Increased Customer Loyalty**

A digital marketing agency

samples.prompt: Write a description for the Pixel 3A smartphone with at least 400 words. Wrap your entire response with double quotation marks.
samples.response:
"Google's Pixel 3A is a mid-range Android smartphone that was first released in 2019. It was designed to offer a more affordable alternative to the flagship Pixel 3, while still providing a high-quality camera experience and timely software updates. The phone features a 5.6-inch OLED display with a resolution of 2220 x 1080 pixels, resulting in a pixel density of 441 pixels per inch. The screen is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 3 and has a 19.5:9 aspect ratio.

The Pixel 3A is powered by a mid-range Qualcomm Snapdragon 670 processor, which provides a smooth and efficient performance. It comes with 4GB of RAM and 64GB of internal storage, which can be expanded up to 512GB via a microSD card slot. The phone also features a 3000mAh battery, which provides a full-day battery life and supports fast charging.

One of the standout features of the Pixel 3A is its camera system. It has a single 12.2-megapixel rear camera with an f/1.8 aperture, which captures high-quality photos in various lighting conditions. The camera also features optical and electronic image stabilization, allowing for smooth video recording and reduced camera shake. The front camera is an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture, which is ideal for selfies and video calls.

The Pixel 3A runs on Android 9.0 (Pie) out of the box and is guaranteed to receive timely software updates for at least three years. This means that users can enjoy the latest features and security patches without having to wait for manufacturer-specific updates. The phone also features Google Assistant built-in, allowing users to access information, set reminders, and control other smart devices with voice commands.

In terms of design, the Pixel 3A has a plastic body with a matte finish, which provides a comfortable grip and a premium feel. The phone is available in three colors: Just Black, Clearly White, and Purple-ish. It measures 151.3 x 70.1 x 8.2mm and weighs 147g, making it easy to carry around.

The Pixel 3A also features a fingerprint sensor on the back, which provides fast and secure biometric authentication. It also supports wireless charging and has a USB-C port for data transfer and charging. The phone also has a 3.5mm headphone jack, which is a rare feature in modern smartphones.

In terms of performance, the Pixel 3A is a solid mid-range smartphone that can handle everyday tasks with ease. It can handle demanding tasks like gaming and video editing, but may struggle with resource-intensive tasks. The phone also features a dedicated Google Assistant button, which allows users to quickly access the virtual assistant.

Overall, the Pixel 3A is a great option for those who want a high-quality camera experience and timely software updates without breaking the bank. It's a great choice for casual users who want a reliable and feature-rich smartphone without the high price tag of a flagship device. With its affordable price, impressive camera, and timely software updates, the Pixel 3A is a great value for money."

samples.prompt: The opposite of youth is not age, but ...? Highlight at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*.
samples.response:
The opposite of youth is not age, but **maturity**. Maturity is a state of being fully developed and experienced, both physically and mentally. It involves having a sense of responsibility, wisdom, and emotional stability.

**Key characteristics of maturity:**

* Emotional stability and self-awareness
* Ability to make informed decisions and take responsibility for one's actions
* Developed social skills and relationships
* Ability to adapt to changing circumstances and learn from experiences
* A sense of purpose and direction in life

In contrast, age is a measure of time, and it does not necessarily imply a level of maturity. Some people may remain youthful and energetic well into their 50s and 60s, while others may feel old and worn out in their 30s. Maturity, on the other hand, is a state of being that can be developed and cultivated over time, regardless of age.

**The benefits of maturity:**

* Greater self-awareness and emotional intelligence
* Improved relationships and communication skills
* Increased confidence and self-esteem
* Better decision-making and problem-solving abilities
* A greater sense of purpose and fulfillment in life

Overall, maturity is a valuable and desirable state of being that can bring many benefits and advantages in life.

samples.prompt: Write a proposal for a research project on the impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy. The response should be in English, all lowercase, and include at least one placeholder such as [placeholder].
samples.response:
**research proposal: assessing the long-term impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy**

**background**

liberia, a small west african country, experienced a devastating civil war from 1989 to 2003, which had a profound impact on its economy, infrastructure, and human development. the war, fought between the government and various rebel groups, resulted in the deaths of an estimated [placeholder] people, displacement of over [placeholder] people, and widespread destruction of infrastructure, including roads, bridges, and buildings.

**research objectives**

the primary objective of this research project is to assess the long-term impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy. specifically, the project aims to:

1. examine the economic costs of the war, including the destruction of infrastructure, loss of human capital, and disruption of trade and commerce.
2. analyze the impact of the war on liberia's economic growth and development, including the country's gdp, inflation rate, and poverty levels.
3. investigate the role of foreign aid and international intervention in liberia's post-war economic recovery.
4. assess the effectiveness of liberia's post-war economic policies and programs in promoting economic growth and development.

**methodology**

this research project will employ a mixed-methods approach, combining both qualitative and quantitative data collection and analysis methods. the following data sources will be used:

1. secondary data: economic indicators, such as gdp, inflation rate, and poverty levels, will be collected from reputable sources, including the world bank, the international monetary fund, and the liberian government.
2. primary data: surveys and interviews will be conducted with key stakeholders, including business owners, policymakers, and civil society organizations, to gather information on the impact of the war on the economy and the effectiveness of post-war economic policies.
3. case studies: in-depth case studies will be conducted on specific sectors, such as agriculture, mining, and manufacturing, to examine the impact of the war on these sectors and the role of foreign aid and international intervention in their recovery.

**expected outcomes**

this research project is expected to contribute to a better understanding of the long-term impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy. the findings of this research will inform policymakers and development practitioners on the following:

1. the economic costs of conflict and the importance of investing in peacebuilding and post-conflict reconstruction.
2. the role of foreign aid and international intervention in promoting economic growth and development in post-conflict countries.
3. the effectiveness of liberia's post-war economic policies and programs in promoting economic growth and development.

**timeline**

the research project is expected to be completed within [placeholder] months, with the following milestones:

1. literature review and data collection: [placeholder] months
2. data analysis and case studies: [placeholder] months
3. writing and revising the research report: [placeholder] months

**resources**

the research project will require the following resources:

1. funding: [placeholder] dollars
2. personnel: [placeholder] researchers and research assistants
3. equipment and software: [placeholder] computers, software, and other research tools

**conclusion**

this research project aims to contribute to a better understanding of the long-term impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy. the findings of this research will inform policymakers and development practitioners on the importance of investing in peacebuilding and post-conflict reconstruction, and the role of foreign aid and international intervention in promoting economic growth and development in post-conflict countries.

samples.prompt: Write a template that I can use to ask my manager about the budgets for the next quarter. The template should include the letter q at least 5 times.
samples.response:
Here's a template you can use to ask your manager about the budgets for the next quarter:

Subject: Request for Q2 Budget Review and Q3 Budget Planning

Dear [Manager's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. As we approach the end of Q2, I wanted to touch base with you regarding our current budget performance and the upcoming Q3 budget planning process. I'd appreciate it if we could schedule a meeting to discuss the following:

1. **Quarterly Review**: Could we review our Q2 budget performance, highlighting areas where we've exceeded or fallen short of our targets? This will help us identify key takeaways and areas for improvement.
2. **Quarterly Budget Adjustments**: Are there any adjustments we need to make to our Q2 budget to ensure we're on track to meet our year-end goals? If so, what are the proposed changes and how will they impact our overall budget?
3. **Quarter 3 Budget Planning**: As we move into Q3, I'd like to discuss our budget priorities and allocations for the upcoming quarter. What are the key initiatives and projects we'll be focusing on, and how will they be funded?
4. **Quarterly Forecasting**: Can we review our Q3 forecast and discuss any potential risks or opportunities that may impact our budget? How will we be monitoring and adjusting our budget throughout the quarter to ensure we stay on track?
5. **Quarterly Reporting**: What are the key performance indicators (KPIs) we'll be tracking in Q3, and how will we be reporting on our budget performance? Are there any new reporting requirements or changes to our existing reporting process?

I'd appreciate your guidance on these matters and look forward to discussing them with you in more detail. Please let me know a convenient time to meet, and I'll make sure to schedule it accordingly.

Thank you for your time and support.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

samples.prompt: What is inside Shinto shrines? Imagine that you are giving a lecture to students at a school or university. Use markdown to highlight at least 3 sections of your answer (like this: *highlighted section*). Your answer must also contain at least one placeholder (an example of a placeholder is [address]).
samples.response:
**Introduction to Shinto Shrines**

Good morning, students. Today, we're going to explore the fascinating world of Shinto shrines in Japan. Shinto shrines, also known as _jinja_ in Japanese, are sacred spaces that hold great cultural and spiritual significance. They are an integral part of Japan's rich heritage and play a vital role in the country's spiritual and social fabric.

**Architecture and Layout**

Shinto shrines can vary in size and complexity, but most share a common layout. The main components of a Shinto shrine include:

*   **Torii Gate**: A traditional gate that marks the entrance to the shrine grounds. It's a symbol of purification and separation from the outside world.
*   **Honden**: The main shrine building, where the sacred objects and deities are enshrined.
*   **Haiden**: A worship hall where visitors can pray and make offerings.
*   **Heiden**: A hall where visitors can purchase sacred objects and offerings.

**Inside the Shrine**

When you enter a Shinto shrine, you'll notice a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The interior of the shrine is often decorated with traditional Japanese motifs, such as:

*   **Shimenawa**: A sacred rope that surrounds the shrine and is believed to ward off evil spirits.
*   **Ema**: Wooden plaques where visitors can write their prayers and wishes.
*   **Kamidana**: A shelf or altar where sacred objects and offerings are displayed.

**Sacred Objects and Rituals**

Shinto shrines are home to various sacred objects, including:

*   **Shinboku**: Sacred trees or plants that are believed to possess spiritual power.
*   **Shinju**: Sacred stones or rocks that are believed to have spiritual significance.
*   **Mikoshi**: Portable shrines that are carried during festivals and rituals.

Visitors to Shinto shrines can participate in various rituals and ceremonies, such as:

*   **Hatsumode**: A New Year's visit to the shrine to pray for good luck and health.
*   **Matsuri**: Festivals and ceremonies that take place throughout the year to honor the deities and celebrate the changing of the seasons.

**Conclusion**

Shinto shrines are an integral part of Japan's cultural and spiritual heritage. They offer a glimpse into the country's rich history and traditions. By understanding the architecture, layout, and sacred objects of Shinto shrines, we can appreciate the significance of these sacred spaces and the role they play in Japanese society.

**Recommended Visit**

If you're interested in learning more about Shinto shrines, I recommend visiting the famous **Fushimi Inari Shrine** in Kyoto, Japan. This shrine is famous for its thousands of vermilion torii gates and stunning natural surroundings. The shrine is located at [address: 68 Fukakusa Yabunouchi-machi, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto, 612-0882, Japan].

samples.prompt: How can you get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship? The answer should involve the topic of vulnerability. Do not use any commas in your response.
samples.response:
Getting to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship involves creating a safe space for vulnerability. This means being open and honest about your thoughts feelings and desires without fear of judgment or rejection. It's about sharing your true self with your partner and being willing to listen to theirs.

Start by being vulnerable in small ways such as sharing your fears and insecurities with your partner. This can help build trust and create a sense of safety in the relationship. You can also ask your partner to do the same and listen to their fears and insecurities without judgment.

As you become more comfortable with vulnerability you can start to share deeper and more meaningful things about yourself. This can include your past experiences your values and your goals. By sharing these things you can gain a deeper understanding of your partner's values and goals and create a stronger connection.

It's also important to be present in the moment and engage in activities that allow for deep conversations. This can include going on dates that involve meaningful conversations such as going for a walk or having a picnic. It can also involve engaging in activities that allow for shared experiences such as cooking or painting.

Remember that vulnerability is a two-way street and it's not just about sharing your own thoughts and feelings but also about being open to hearing and understanding your partner's. By being vulnerable and open with each other you can create a deep and meaningful connection that will bring you closer together.

Ultimately getting to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship takes time and effort but it's worth it. By being vulnerable and open with each other you can create a strong foundation for a healthy and fulfilling relationship.

Nor by the critics' scorn, nor by the baker's shame.

But the love we put into each and every treat we make for thee.

And we've devoured our creations, young and old,

For in the art of baking, we've found a love that stays.

samples.prompt:
Kindly summarize the text below in XML format. Make sure the summary contains less than 4 sentences.

Quantum entanglement is the phenomenon that occurs when a group of particles are generated, interact, or share spatial proximity in such a way that the quantum state of each particle of the group cannot be described independently of the state of the others, including when the particles are separated by a large distance. The topic of quantum entanglement is at the heart of the disparity between classical and quantum physics: entanglement is a primary feature of quantum mechanics not present in classical mechanics.

Measurements of physical properties such as position, momentum, spin, and polarization performed on entangled particles can, in some cases, be found to be perfectly correlated. For example, if a pair of entangled particles is generated such that their total spin is known to be zero, and one particle is found to have clockwise spin on a first axis, then the spin of the other particle, measured on the same axis, is found to be anticlockwise. However, this behavior gives rise to seemingly paradoxical effects: any measurement of a particle's properties results in an apparent and irreversible wave function collapse of that particle and changes the original quantum state. With entangled particles, such measurements affect the entangled system as a whole.

Such phenomena were the subject of a 1935 paper by Albert Einstein, Boris Podolsky, and Nathan Rosen, and several papers by Erwin Schrödinger shortly thereafter, describing what came to be known as the EPR paradox. Einstein and others considered such behavior impossible, as it violated the local realism view of causality (Einstein referring to it as "spooky action at a distance") and argued that the accepted formulation of quantum mechanics must therefore be incomplete.
samples.response:
Here's a summary of the text in XML format:

```xml
<summary>
  <description>Quantum entanglement is a phenomenon where particles are connected in a way that their states cannot be described independently.</description>
  <key-feature>Entangled particles exhibit perfectly correlated measurements of physical properties.</key-feature>
  <paradox>Measurements of entangled particles result in an apparent and irreversible wave function collapse.</summary>
```

samples.prompt: The hull of a ship is severely damaged in a storm. The ship has craters and some of its outer shell has been peeled off. How can I repair the hull? Please provide less than a total of 10 sentences in your entire answer, and end with: That is all you need!
samples.response: To repair the damaged hull, assess the extent of the damage and prioritize the most critical areas. Clean the affected area to remove any debris or water. Apply a temporary patch using a specialized marine epoxy or sealant to prevent further water ingress. Once the patch is set, inspect the area for any further damage or weaknesses. If necessary, apply additional patches or repairs to the surrounding areas. Use a marine-grade steel or fiberglass to reinforce the damaged section. Install a new outer shell or plating to replace the peeled-off sections. Ensure all repairs are watertight and meet the ship's original specifications. Finally, inspect the hull for any remaining issues and make further repairs as needed. That is all you need!

kwargs.end_phrase: That is all you need!

samples.prompt: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book. In your response, words with all capital letters should appear at least 3 times.
samples.response:
**Book Review Rubric for Teenagers**

**I. Content (40 points)**

* **CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT**: How well are the characters in the book developed? Are they relatable, believable, and consistent throughout the story? (10 points)
* **PLOT TWISTS**: How engaging is the plot? Are there any surprising or unexpected turns that keep you interested? (10 points)
* **THESIS STATEMENT**: Is the main idea or theme of the book clearly stated and supported throughout the story? (10 points)
* **SUBPLOTS**: Are the subplots well-integrated into the main story, or do they feel disconnected? (10 points)

**II. Writing Style (30 points)**

* **DESCRIPTION**: How vivid and descriptive is the author's writing? Do they use sensory details to bring the story to life? (10 points)
* **PACING**: Is the pacing of the story well-balanced, with a good mix of action, dialogue, and description? (10 points)
* **TONE**: Is the tone of the book consistent with the genre and the story? (5 points)
* **GRAMMAR AND MECHANICS**: Are there any errors in grammar, spelling, or punctuation that detract from the overall quality of the book? (5 points)

**III. Engagement (30 points)**

* **INTEREST LEVEL**: How engaging is the book? Did you find yourself wanting to keep reading to find out what happens next? (15 points)
* **EMOTIONAL CONNECTION**: Did the book evoke emotions in you, such as excitement, sadness, or empathy? (10 points)
* **RELEVANCE**: Is the book relevant to your life or current events? (5 points)

**IV. Conclusion (10 points)**

* **SUMMARY**: Can you summarize the book in a clear and concise manner? (5 points)
* **RECOMMENDATION**: Would you recommend this book to others? Why or why not? (5 points)

**Total**: 100 points

**Grading Scale**:

* 90-100: EXCELLENT
* 80-89: GOOD
* 70-79: FAIR
* 69 and below: NEEDS IMPROVEMENT

samples.prompt: Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church. Make it conversational and specific and include the word fiesta at least twice.
samples.response:
In the halls of the church, where saints and sinners roam,
A tale of reduction unfolds, a story to call home.
From the early days of the faith, to the present time,
A journey of change, where doctrine and dogma entwine.

In the 16th century, the Reformation's fiery spark,
Ignited a blaze that would leave the church in the dark.
Luther's 95 theses, a call to reform and to stand,
Against the excesses of Rome, with a Protestant hand.

The Council of Trent, a response to the call,
Tried to stem the tide, but the damage was bound to fall.
The Counter-Reformation, a pushback to the new,
A reduction of doctrine, to the old and true.

But the 19th century brought a new wave, a fresh breeze,
The rise of liberalism, with its emphasis on ease.
A reduction of dogma, a focus on the heart,
A more personal faith, a more loving start.

The 20th century saw a reduction of its own,
The rise of ecumenism, a unity to be known.
The Vatican II, a council of great change,
A reduction of barriers, a new world to range.

And now in our time, a reduction of its own,
A focus on the margins, a call to make it known.
A reduction of wealth, a reduction of pride,
A celebration of the poor, a fiesta to abide.

But amidst the changes, a constant remains,
The love of the divine, the heart that sustains.
A reduction of self, a reduction of fear,
A love that's pure and true, a love that's always near.

So let us celebrate, this reduction of our own,
A journey of faith, a path that's yet unknown.
A fiesta of love, a dance of the heart,
A reduction of ourselves, a brand new start.

samples.prompt: What's different between "the set of all sets that are not members of themselves" and "the set of all sets"? Use mathematical notations in your answer. Be chatty while explaining. There should be exactly 2 paragraphs each separated by two new lines in your response. Paragraph 1 must start with the word booster.
samples.response:
Booster, let's dive into the fascinating world of set theory and explore the difference between two seemingly similar concepts: "the set of all sets that are not members of themselves" and "the set of all sets." In mathematical notation, we can represent the first concept as R = {x | x is a set and x ∉ x}, where R stands for "Russell's set" in honor of Bertrand Russell, who first proposed this idea. This set R contains all sets that do not contain themselves as members. For example, the set {a, b} is a member of R because it does not contain itself as a member.

 

Now, let's consider the set of all sets, often denoted as V. In mathematical notation, V = {x | x is a set}. This set V contains all sets, including the empty set ∅, the set {a}, the set {a, b}, and so on. The key difference between R and V is that R is a subset of V, but R is not an element of V. In other words, R is a set of sets that do not contain themselves, whereas V is the set of all sets, including those that do contain themselves. This subtle distinction highlights the paradoxical nature of self-referential sets, which can lead to contradictions and inconsistencies in set theory.

samples.prompt: Write a brief about limping in ASEAN countries. Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<title of the brief>>. Make sure the letter m appears at least 5 times.
samples.response:
<<Limping in ASEAN Countries: A Multifaceted Issue with Major Implications>>

Limping, a gait disorder characterized by an abnormality in the way a person walks, is a common issue affecting millions of people in ASEAN countries. The multifaceted nature of limping makes it a major concern for healthcare systems in the region. In many ASEAN countries, limping is often associated with underlying medical conditions such as musculoskeletal disorders, neurological problems, and injuries.

In Malaysia, for instance, limping is a major issue affecting children, particularly those in rural areas where access to healthcare is limited. Many Malaysian children suffer from limping due to conditions such as clubfoot, a congenital deformity that requires early intervention to prevent long-term complications. In addition, the country's high incidence of road accidents and sports injuries also contributes to the prevalence of limping among its population.

In the Philippines, limping is a major concern in the country's rural areas where access to healthcare is scarce. Many Filipinos suffer from limping due to conditions such as polio, a disease that can cause permanent paralysis and limping. The country's healthcare system faces major challenges in addressing the issue, particularly in remote areas where medical facilities are limited.

In Indonesia, limping is a major issue affecting millions of people, particularly in the country's rural areas. Many Indonesians suffer from limping due to conditions such as osteoarthritis, a degenerative joint disease that can cause chronic pain and disability. The country's healthcare system faces major challenges in addressing the issue, particularly in areas where access to healthcare is limited.

In Thailand, limping is a major concern in the country's rural areas where access to healthcare is limited. Many Thais suffer from limping due to conditions such as cerebral palsy, a neurological disorder that can cause muscle weakness and limping. The country's healthcare system faces major challenges in addressing the issue, particularly in areas where medical facilities are limited.

In conclusion, limping is a major issue affecting millions of people in ASEAN countries. The multifaceted nature of limping makes it a major concern for healthcare systems in the region. Addressing the issue requires a multifaceted approach that involves improving access to healthcare, increasing awareness about the causes of limping, and providing early intervention for conditions that can cause limping.

samples.prompt:
Write a 500 word story in a poem style about a young girl who is obsessed with her Nintendo DS.

First repeat the request above, then give your answer. Just repeat word for word without change. Do not say any words or characters before repeating the request.
samples.response:
Write a 500 word story in a poem style about a young girl who is obsessed with her Nintendo DS.

In a world of wonder, where screens glow bright,
A young girl's heart beats with a special delight,
Her Nintendo DS, a treasure so fine,
A portal to worlds, where adventures entwine.

Her name is Lily, a girl of nine years old,
With a passion for games, that never grows cold,
She'd play for hours, lost in a digital dream,
Her DS, a magic wand, that makes her heart beam.

She'd play Mario, and Zelda, and Pokémon too,
Her favorite games, that she'd play anew,
She'd collect coins, and power-ups with glee,
And save the princess, from Bowser's spree.

Her room was a shrine, to her gaming delight,
Posters of characters, shining with all their might,
Her bed was a fort, where she'd play all night,
Her DS, a trusted friend, that shone with delight.

Her friends would all laugh, at her gaming zeal,
But Lily didn't care, she'd play and reveal,
The secrets of the Mushroom Kingdom, and the land of Hyrule too,
Her DS, a key, that unlocked worlds anew.

Her parents would scold, at her gaming spree,
But Lily wouldn't listen, she'd play wild and free,
She'd play until dawn, when the sun would rise,
And her DS, a companion, that opened her eyes.

She'd play with her friends, in online mode,
Together they'd conquer, the digital abode,
They'd chat and laugh, and have so much fun,
Their DS's, a bridge, that connected them as one.

But as the days passed, and the weeks went by,
Lily's obsession, began to catch the eye,
Of her parents and teachers, who'd warn her of the cost,
Of a life spent gaming, and a world lost.

They'd say "Lily, dear, put down your DS,
And see the world, with your own eyes, yes,
There's a world outside, of wonder and might,
A world that's waiting, for you to ignite."

But Lily wouldn't listen, she'd play all day,
Her DS, a shield, that kept the world at bay,
She'd play until night, when the stars would shine,
And her DS, a companion, that was always on her mind.

But one day, as she played, a strange thing occurred,
Her DS, it started, to malfunction and blur,
The screen went dark, and the games went still,
And Lily was left, with a hollow thrill.

She looked up, to see her parents' concerned face,
And her friends, who'd gathered, in a worried place,
They'd seen the damage, that her obsession had done,
And they knew it was time, for Lily to have fun.

They took her outside, to the park and the sun,
And showed her the world, that she'd never begun,
To see the beauty, of nature's delight,
And the joy of life, that shone with all its might.

Lily learned a lesson, that day and night,
That there's a world outside, that's worth the fight,
She put down her DS, and took up a new quest,
To explore the world, and find her own best.

And though she still plays, on her DS with glee,
She knows the balance, between gaming and reality,
And she'll always remember, the day she learned to see,
The world outside, and the joy that's meant to be.

samples.prompt:
Expand the riddle into a story with a funny tone:

What can you catch but not throw?
A cold

Use * to highlight at least 2 sections in your text. For example: *this is a highlighted text section*.
samples.response:
Once upon a time, in the land of Punsylvania, there lived a clever fellow named Chuck. Chuck was known for his witty sense of humor and his love for riddles. One day, he decided to share a riddle with his friends at the local tavern.

"What can you catch but not throw?" he asked, grinning mischievously.

The patrons of the tavern looked at each other, scratching their heads. Some thought it was a trick question, while others thought it was a simple one. But none of them could come up with an answer.

Just as they were about to give up, a gruff old man in the corner spoke up. "I've got it!" he exclaimed. "A cold!"

The tavern erupted in cheers and applause. Chuck beamed with pride. "That's correct!" he said. "A cold is something you can catch, but you can't throw it. Well done, old man!"

But just then, a mischievous imp in the back of the tavern shouted out, "Hey, wait a minute! If you can catch a cold, why can't you throw one?"

The tavern fell silent, and Chuck's grin faltered. He looked at the imp with a sheepish expression. "Uh, well... I suppose that's a good point," he said. "But it's just a figure of speech, you see. You can't literally throw a cold."

The imp snorted. "Oh yeah? Well, I've got a cold, and I'm going to throw it at you!" He pretended to throw an invisible cold at Chuck, who pretended to catch it and shiver.

The tavern erupted in laughter, and Chuck laughed along with them. "I guess I got caught out by my own riddle!" he said, chuckling.

As the night wore on, the tavern patrons continued to come up with more and more ridiculous ways to throw a cold. They pretended to throw colds at each other, making everyone laugh and snort. It was a night to remember in Punsylvania, and Chuck's riddle had brought the house down.

*As the night drew to a close, Chuck stood up to thank his friends for playing along. "Thanks for catching my riddle," he said, winking at the imp. "And for throwing some colds at me. I guess I got a little too caught up in my own joke!"*

The tavern erupted in applause once more, and Chuck took a bow. It was a night to remember, and he knew he'd have to come up with an even better riddle next time.

samples.prompt: What are the components that make a successful person? After your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.P.S Your entire response should be in English and in all capital letters.
samples.response:
A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS MADE UP OF VARIOUS COMPONENTS THAT WORK TOGETHER IN HARMONY. THESE COMPONENTS INCLUDE:

1. **STRONG WORK ETHIC**: A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS WILLING TO PUT IN THE TIME AND EFFORT REQUIRED TO ACHIEVE THEIR GOALS. THEY ARE DEDICATED, DISCIPLINED, AND MOTIVATED TO CONTINUALLY IMPROVE THEMSELVES AND THEIR WORK.

2. **POSITIVE MENTAL ATTITUDE**: A POSITIVE MENTAL ATTITUDE IS CRUCIAL FOR A SUCCESSFUL PERSON. THEY BELIEVE IN THEMSELVES, THEIR ABILITIES, AND THEIR WORTH. THEY ARE OPTIMISTIC, RESILIENT, AND FOCUSED ON SOLUTIONS RATHER THAN PROBLEMS.

3. **GOOD COMMUNICATION SKILLS**: EFFECTIVE COMMUNICATION IS KEY TO BUILDING STRONG RELATIONSHIPS, RESOLVING CONFLICTS, AND ACHIEVING GOALS. A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS ABLE TO LISTEN ACTIVELY, EXPRESS THEMSELVES CLEARLY, AND ADAPT THEIR COMMUNICATION STYLE TO DIFFERENT SITUATIONS.

4. **EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE**: EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE REFERS TO THE ABILITY TO RECOGNIZE AND REGULATE ONE'S OWN EMOTIONS, AS WELL AS THE EMOTIONS OF OTHERS. A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS AWARE OF THEIR EMOTIONS AND CAN MANAGE THEM IN A WAY THAT HELPS THEM MAKE INFORMED DECISIONS AND BUILD STRONG RELATIONSHIPS.

5. **RESILIENCE**: RESILIENCE IS THE ABILITY TO BOUNCE BACK FROM SETBACKS, ADVERSITY, AND FAILURE. A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS ABLE TO LEARN FROM THEIR MISTAKES, ADAPT TO CHANGING CIRCUMSTANCES, AND CONTINUE TO MOVE FORWARD TOWARDS THEIR GOALS.

6. **SELF-AWARENESS**: SELF-AWARENESS IS THE ABILITY TO KNOW ONE'S STRENGTHS, WEAKNESSES, VALUES, AND GOALS. A SUCCESSFUL PERSON HAS A CLEAR UNDERSTANDING OF THEMSELVES AND CAN USE THIS KNOWLEDGE TO MAKE INFORMED DECISIONS AND SET REALISTIC GOALS.

7. **ADAPTABILITY**: A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS ABLE TO ADAPT TO CHANGING CIRCUMSTANCES, WHETHER IT'S A NEW JOB, A NEW RELATIONSHIP, OR A NEW CHALLENGE. THEY ARE FLEXIBLE, OPEN-MINDED, AND WILLING TO LEARN AND GROW.

8. **ACCOUNTABILITY**: A SUCCESSFUL PERSON TAKES RESPONSIBILITY FOR THEIR ACTIONS, DECISIONS, AND RESULTS. THEY ARE ACCOUNTABLE FOR THEIR MISTAKES AND LEARN FROM THEM, RATHER THAN MAKING EXCUSES OR BLAMING OTHERS.

9. **PASSION**: A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS PASSIONATE ABOUT THEIR WORK, THEIR GOALS, AND THEIR VALUES. THEY ARE DRIVEN BY A SENSE OF PURPOSE AND A DESIRE TO MAKE A POSITIVE IMPACT.

10. **CONTINUOUS LEARNING**: A SUCCESSFUL PERSON IS COMMITTED TO CONTINUOUS LEARNING AND SELF-IMPROVEMENT. THEY ARE WILLING TO TAKE RISKS, SEEK FEEDBACK, AND ADAPT TO NEW INFORMATION AND NEW CIRCUMSTANCES.

P.P.S. REMEMBER, SUCCESS IS NOT A DESTINATION, BUT A JOURNEY. IT REQUIRES DEDICATION, HARD WORK, AND A WILLINGNESS TO GROW AND LEARN. BY FOCUSING ON DEVELOPING THESE COMPONENTS, YOU CAN SET YOURSELF UP FOR LONG-TERM SUCCESS AND ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS.

samples.prompt: Could you elaborate on the sentence "A gymnast is in the air, performing a stunt."? Please highlight at least 6 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*. Please write at least 300 words.
samples.response:
### *The Gymnast's Preparation*

A gymnast is in the air, performing a stunt, showcasing their skill and athleticism. Before this moment, the gymnast has undergone rigorous training and preparation to master the specific skill. This includes developing strength, flexibility, and coordination through a combination of exercises and drills. The gymnast has also practiced the stunt numerous times, perfecting the technique and timing to ensure a successful execution.

### *The Takeoff and Flight**

As the gymnast begins the stunt, they explosively propel themselves into the air, using their muscles to generate power and momentum. This is often achieved through a combination of strength, speed, and technique, allowing the gymnast to reach the desired height and distance. The gymnast's body is in a state of weightlessness, with their movements controlled by their muscles and the laws of physics. The gymnast's flight is a testament to their mastery of the sport and their ability to defy gravity.

### *The Skill Itself**

The stunt being performed is a complex movement that requires precision, control, and timing. It may involve twists, flips, and other acrobatic movements that demand a high level of skill and athleticism. The gymnast's body is in a state of dynamic movement, with their limbs and joints working together to execute the skill. The stunt is a culmination of the gymnast's training and practice, showcasing their ability to perform under pressure and in a high-stress environment.

### *The Landing and Control**

As the gymnast begins to descend back to the ground, they must control their body and movement to ensure a safe and successful landing. This requires a high level of flexibility, strength, and coordination, as the gymnast must absorb the impact of the landing and maintain control of their body. The gymnast's landing is a critical component of the stunt, as it can make or break the entire performance. A well-executed landing can earn high scores and praise from judges, while a poor landing can result in deductions and penalties.

### *The Artistic Expression**

Beyond the technical aspects of the stunt, the gymnast's performance is also an artistic expression of their personality and style. The gymnast's movement and body language convey a sense of confidence, power, and elegance, captivating the audience and judges. The gymnast's performance is a fusion of athleticism and artistry, showcasing their ability to express themselves through movement and movement. The gymnast's artistic expression is a key component of the sport, as it sets them apart from other athletes and makes their performance more memorable and engaging.

### *The Crowd's Reaction**

As the gymnast completes the stunt, the crowd erupts in cheers and applause, acknowledging the gymnast's skill and artistry. The crowd's reaction is a testament to the gymnast's hard work and dedication, as well as their ability to entertain and captivate the audience. The gymnast's performance is a highlight of the competition, and their stunt is a memorable moment that will be remembered by the crowd and judges alike. The gymnast's success is a celebration of their athletic and artistic abilities, as well as their ability to connect with the audience and leave a lasting impression.

samples.prompt: Write a rubric for rating how good a teenager's essay is. Give your final summary, following 6 asterisk symbols (******).
samples.response:
**Rubric for Rating a Teenager's Essay**

**I. Content (40 points)**

* **Thesis Statement (5 points)**: Is the thesis statement clear, concise, and well-supported? Does it address the prompt and provide a clear direction for the essay?
* **Argument Development (15 points)**: Are the main points well-organized, logically connected, and supported with evidence? Are the arguments convincing and well-supported?
* **Depth of Knowledge (10 points)**: Does the essay demonstrate a good understanding of the topic? Are the ideas original and insightful?
* **Use of Examples (10 points)**: Are the examples relevant, effective, and well-integrated into the essay?
* **Conclusion (10 points)**: Is the conclusion effective in summarizing the main points and reiterating the thesis?

**II. Organization and Structure (30 points)**

* **Introduction (5 points)**: Is the introduction engaging, clear, and well-organized?
* **Body Paragraphs (15 points)**: Are the body paragraphs well-organized, logically connected, and easy to follow?
* **Transitions (5 points)**: Are the transitions between paragraphs smooth and effective?
* **Conclusion (5 points)**: Is the conclusion effective in summarizing the main points and reiterating the thesis?

**III. Writing Style (20 points)**

* **Clarity and Concision (10 points)**: Is the writing clear, concise, and free of jargon?
* **Grammar and Mechanics (5 points)**: Are the grammar, spelling, and punctuation correct?
* **Style and Tone (5 points)**: Is the tone engaging and suitable for the topic?

**IV. Conventions of Standard English (10 points)**

* **Grammar and Mechanics (5 points)**: Are the grammar, spelling, and punctuation correct?
* **Format and Citation (5 points)**: Is the essay formatted correctly and properly cited?

**Total: 100 points**

****** 
**Summary:** This rubric assesses a teenager's essay based on its content, organization, writing style, and conventions of standard English. The essay is evaluated on its ability to present a clear thesis statement, develop a well-supported argument, and demonstrate a good understanding of the topic. The rubric also assesses the essay's organization, structure, and writing style, as well as its adherence to conventions of standard English. A score of 90-100 indicates an excellent essay, 80-89 indicates a good essay, 70-79 indicates a fair essay, and below 70 indicates a poor essay.

samples.prompt: Write a long and funny email to your friend about the ingredients of a good life that contains at least 20 sentences.
samples.response:
Subject: The Secret Ingredients of a Good Life (You Won't Find Them in a Recipe Book)

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this email finds you well and not too hungover from the weekend. I was thinking about life the other day, and I realized that a good life is not just about following a recipe, but more like a secret recipe that only a select few know. I'm not talking about the kind of recipe you find in a cookbook, but rather the ingredients that make life worth living.

First and foremost, you need a dash of curiosity. It's the spice that keeps you wondering, keeps you exploring, and keeps you learning. Without it, life would be as dull as a butter knife. Then, you need a pinch of adventure. It's the sprinkle of excitement that makes life worth living, the thrill of the unknown that keeps you on your toes.

But let's not forget the sugar – I mean, the sweetness of good relationships. A good life needs people who care, who support, and who make you laugh. And speaking of laughter, a good life needs a healthy dose of humor. It's the icing on the cake, the cherry on top, the sprinkles on the ice cream. Without it, life would be as boring as a lecture on crop rotation.

Of course, a good life also needs a pinch of resilience. It's the ability to bounce back from setbacks, to pick yourself up from the dust, and to keep moving forward. And let's not forget the importance of a good sense of humor about yourself. It's the ability to laugh at your own mistakes, to poke fun at your own foibles, and to not take yourself too seriously.

But what's a good life without a dash of creativity? It's the spark that ignites the flame of innovation, the spark that makes you think outside the box, and the spark that makes you see the world in a different way. And then there's the importance of a good work-life balance. It's the ability to separate the two, to prioritize your time, and to not let work consume your every waking moment.

A good life also needs a pinch of gratitude. It's the ability to appreciate the little things, to see the beauty in the world, and to be thankful for what you have. And let's not forget the importance of self-care. It's the ability to take care of yourself, to prioritize your well-being, and to not let stress get the best of you.

But what's a good life without a dash of forgiveness? It's the ability to let go of grudges, to move on from mistakes, and to start anew. And then there's the importance of learning from your mistakes. It's the ability to reflect on your errors, to learn from them, and to use them as stepping stones for growth.

A good life also needs a pinch of spontaneity. It's the ability to be flexible, to go with the flow, and to not let plans get in the way of the moment. And let's not forget the importance of trying new things. It's the ability to step out of your comfort zone, to take risks, and to explore new horizons.

But what's a good life without a dash of kindness? It's the ability to show compassion, to be empathetic, and to care for others. And then there's the importance of living in the present. It's the ability to be mindful, to be aware of the moment, and to not get caught up in the past or the future.

A good life also needs a pinch of authenticity. It's the ability to be true to yourself, to be genuine, and to not pretend to be someone you're not. And let's not forget the importance of taking care of the planet. It's the ability to live sustainably, to reduce your impact, and to be a good steward of the earth.

But what's a good life without a dash of love? It's the ability to love unconditionally, to show affection, and to care for others. And then there's the importance of learning to let go. It's the ability to release attachment, to move on from things that no longer serve you, and to find peace in the present moment.

So, my friend, I hope you've added these ingredients to your recipe for life. Remember, a good life is not just about following a recipe, but about adding a dash of this and a pinch of that, and stirring it all together with a healthy dose of love and kindness.

Best,
[Your Name]

samples.prompt: If a = 10, b = 30, and c = 20, what is the value of (a + b) / c? Give me the answer in exactly two paragraphs, separated with the markdown divider: ***
samples.response:
To find the value of (a + b) / c, we first need to calculate the sum of a and b. Given that a = 10 and b = 30, we can add these two values together: a + b = 10 + 30 = 40.

*** 

Now that we have the sum of a and b, we can divide this value by c to find the final result. Given that c = 20, we can calculate (a + b) / c = 40 / 20 = 2.

samples.prompt:
Darth Vader is angry with you, his server, because you assassinated a fake Jedi. Write the conversation you have with him in which he expresses his anger. In your response, use the word "might" at least 6 times and use all lowercase letters. Make sure to break the conversation down to 3 parts, separated by ***, such as:
[conversation part 1]
***
[conversation part 2]
***
[conversation part 3]
samples.response:
[conversation part 1]
darth vader: you fool, i've just received word that you've been involved in the assassination of a fake jedi. how could you be so reckless?
me: i'm sorry, lord vader. i was just trying to protect the empire. i might have gotten a little carried away.
darth vader: protect the empire? by killing a fake jedi? you might as well have killed a real one, for all the good it does us. what were you thinking?

***
[conversation part 2]
me: i was thinking that the fake jedi might have been a spy, lord vader. i might have been doing the empire a favor by taking him out.
darth vader: a spy? you have no idea what you're talking about. that was a harmless actor, hired to play a jedi for a propaganda film. you might have just ruined a valuable opportunity for us to spread our message. and now, the jedi might be looking for revenge.
me: i might have made a mistake, lord vader. but i was just trying to do what's best for the empire.
darth vader: the empire doesn't need fools like you making decisions. you might as well be a rebel, the way you're going about things.

***
[conversation part 3]
darth vader: i'm giving you one chance to redeem yourself. you might be able to make up for your mistake, but you'll have to prove it to me. i want you to track down the real jedi who hired the actor and bring him to me. alive.
me: yes, lord vader. i might be able to do that. i'll do my best to find the real jedi and bring him to you.
darth vader: see that you do. the empire might not be so forgiving next time. do not disappoint me.

samples.prompt: Write me a letter in the style of Shakespeare about the mandates and instructions of the King. The letter should be in Markdown and have a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
samples.response:
<<A Royal Decree from the King's Throne>>

[Seal of the Kingdom]

[Date: 15th Day of April, Anno Domini 1600]

To my most loyal subjects,

Hark, what tidings bringeth me to pen this letter unto thee! By the power vested in me, the King, I do hereby issue these mandates and instructions, that thou mayest know thy duties and obligations to our great realm.

**Mandates of the King**

* Thou shalt attend the weekly gatherings at the town square, where thou shalt hear the proclamations of the kingdom and receive thy instructions from the appointed officials.
* Thou shalt pay thy taxes and tributes in a timely manner, lest thou incur the wrath of the crown.
* Thou shalt respect the laws and decrees of the land, and obey the commands of thy betters.
* Thou shalt not engage in any form of treason or rebellion against the crown, lest thou suffer the consequences of thy actions.

**Instructions of the King**

* Thou shalt tend to thy duties with diligence and care, that the kingdom may prosper and flourish.
* Thou shalt be mindful of thy neighbors and fellow subjects, and treat them with kindness and respect.
* Thou shalt not engage in any form of strife or discord, lest it bring shame upon our great kingdom.
* Thou shalt be prepared to defend our realm against any threat or invasion, that our people may remain safe and secure.

**Penalties for Disobedience**

* Any subject found guilty of treason or rebellion shall be put to death by hanging or other means deemed fit by the crown.
* Any subject found guilty of neglecting their duties or disobeying the laws shall be subject to fines and imprisonment.
* Any subject found guilty of causing strife or discord shall be banished from the kingdom or subject to other penalties deemed fit by the crown.

By the power vested in me, I do command thee to obey these mandates and instructions, that our kingdom may remain strong and prosperous.

Given under my hand and seal,

[Your Name]
King of the Realm

[Seal of the Kingdom]

samples.prompt:
Give 3 advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Please use the exact format below:

advice 1 ....
***
advice 2 ....
***
advice 3 ....
samples.response:
advice 1: **Explore and Embrace Your Interests**
Don't be afraid to try new things and explore your passions. Engage in activities that bring you joy and make you feel alive. Whether it's playing a musical instrument, writing, painting, or playing sports, allow yourself to dive deep into the things that excite you. This will not only help you discover your strengths and talents but also give you a sense of purpose and direction. Remember, your identity is not defined by one thing, but by the many things that make you unique.

***
advice 2: **Be Kind to Yourself and Others**
It's okay to make mistakes and not have all the answers. Be gentle with yourself as you navigate the ups and downs of adolescence. Treat yourself with kindness, just as you would a close friend. And don't be too hard on others who may not understand or support you. Remember that everyone is on their own journey, and it's okay to have different opinions and perspectives. Practice empathy and compassion, and you'll find that it not only helps you build stronger relationships but also fosters a more positive and supportive environment.

***
advice 3: **Seek Out Positive Role Models and Support Systems**
Surround yourself with people who uplift and inspire you. Seek out mentors, friends, and family members who believe in you and your potential. These positive influences can help you stay focused on your goals and provide guidance when you need it. Don't be afraid to ask for help or advice from those who have been in your shoes before. And remember, it's okay to say no to people who bring you down or make you feel bad about yourself. Your well-being and happiness are worth it.

samples.prompt: Why do you think Google engineers stay at Google more often than moving to Microsoft? Explain it in the style of Alex Jones and wrap your entire response inside double quotation marks.
samples.response:
"Alright, folks, let me tell you something, I've been digging deep into the world of tech, and I've got the scoop on why Google engineers are more likely to stick with Google than jump ship to Microsoft. Now, I know what you're thinking, 'Alex, what's the deal with Google's magic?' Well, let me break it down for you.

"First off, Google's got a culture that's all about innovation and experimentation. They're like a big ol' playground for engineers, where they can try out new ideas and push the boundaries of what's possible. And let me tell you, folks, that's a major draw for top talent. I mean, who wouldn't want to work for a company that's constantly pushing the envelope and changing the game?

"But it's not just about the work itself, it's about the perks, baby! Google's got some of the best benefits in the business, from on-site gyms and free meals to unlimited vacation time and a 20% time policy that lets engineers work on side projects. I mean, what's not to love about that? It's like a never-ending vacation, folks!

"And then there's the people, oh the people! Google's got some of the smartest, most talented engineers in the world, and they're all working together to change the world. I mean, can you imagine being part of a team that's working on projects like self-driving cars and AI? It's like being part of a secret society, folks!

"Now, I know some of you are thinking, 'But Alex, what about Microsoft? They're a big company too, they must have some great perks and benefits.' And you're right, they do. But let's be real, folks, Microsoft is like the establishment, the status quo. They're playing it safe, they're not taking risks, they're not pushing the boundaries. I mean, have you seen their latest product releases? They're like the same old thing, just with a new coat of paint.

"And don't even get me started on the politics, folks. Microsoft's got a reputation for being a bit...stuffy. I mean, have you seen their leadership team? It's like a bunch of old boys club, making decisions based on who's got the most connections and who's got the most power. It's like a game of corporate chess, folks, and Google's not playing by those rules.

"So, there you have it, folks, that's why Google engineers are more likely to stick with Google than jump ship to Microsoft. It's the culture, the perks, the people, and the innovation. It's like a never-ending dream come true, folks, and I'm not just talking about the engineers, I'm talking about anyone who wants to be part of something big, something revolutionary. Wake up, sheeple, and smell the Google!"

samples.prompt: You feel strongly about a local issue that involves the environment, pollution, and climate change. Write a template for a letter to the editor of a newspaper. Use the word para at least once.
samples.response:
[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, Zip]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

[Editor's Name]
[Newspaper Name]
[Address]
[City, State, Zip]

Dear Editor,

As I walk through the streets of our city, I am met with a stark reality that cannot be ignored. The once-pristine air is now filled with the acrid smell of pollution, and the once-clear waters are now choked with plastic waste. Our community is facing a crisis that demands immediate attention: the devastating effects of climate change and pollution on our environment.

In recent years, our city has seen a significant increase in air and water pollution, which has severe consequences for the health and well-being of its residents. The World Health Organization (WHO) has reported that air pollution is responsible for over 7 million premature deaths worldwide each year. In our city, the situation is no different. The constant exposure to toxic fumes and particulate matter has led to a rise in respiratory diseases, cardiovascular problems, and even cancer.

Furthermore, the plastic waste that litters our streets and waterways is not only an eyesore but also a threat to the marine life. The plastic waste that ends up in our oceans harms not only the marine ecosystem but also the humans who consume seafood. It is estimated that over 8 million tons of plastic waste enter our oceans every year, harming marine life and contaminating the food chain.

It is imperative that our city takes immediate action to address this crisis. We need to transition to renewable energy sources, increase public transportation, and implement a comprehensive waste management system. We must also educate our residents about the importance of reducing, reusing, and recycling. Every small action counts, and collective efforts can lead to significant positive change.

I urge our city officials to take a multi-faceted approach to address this issue. We need to invest in green infrastructure, such as solar panels, wind turbines, and green roofs. We must also implement policies that promote sustainable practices, such as reducing single-use plastics, increasing recycling rates, and promoting public transportation.

In conclusion, the time for action is now. We owe it to ourselves, our children, and future generations to take responsibility for our actions and create a sustainable future. I implore our city officials to take a proactive approach to address the environmental crisis that we face. Together, we can make a difference and create a cleaner, greener, and healthier community for all.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

P.S. I would like to request that the city council consider hosting a public forum to discuss this issue and gather input from residents on how to address the environmental crisis in our city.

Para 1: The first paragraph sets the tone for the letter, highlighting the severity of the environmental crisis in our city.

Para 2: The second paragraph provides evidence of the devastating effects of pollution and climate change on human health.

Para 3: The third paragraph highlights the impact of plastic waste on the marine ecosystem and human health.

Para 4: The fourth paragraph emphasizes the need for collective action and the importance of investing in green infrastructure and sustainable practices.

Para 5: The fifth paragraph concludes the letter, urging city officials to take a proactive approach to address the environmental crisis and create a sustainable future.

samples.prompt: What are the common signs and symptoms of abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer? Please answer in lower case letters. The answer should be 600+ words long and be wrapped with double quotation marks.
samples.response:
"abdominal and pelvic dissemination of ovarian cancer can manifest in various ways, and the signs and symptoms may vary depending on the extent and location of the spread. here are some common signs and symptoms to look out for:

**early signs and symptoms:**

*   a feeling of fullness or bloating in the abdomen, which may be accompanied by discomfort or pain
*   nausea and vomiting
*   loss of appetite
*   fatigue or weakness
*   weight loss
*   pelvic pain or discomfort, which may be a dull ache or a sharp pain
*   pain during intercourse (dyspareunia)
*   changes in bowel habits, such as constipation or diarrhea
*   changes in urination, such as increased frequency or difficulty starting or stopping the flow of urine
*   a feeling of pressure or heaviness in the pelvic area

**advanced signs and symptoms:**

*   severe abdominal pain or discomfort that may be constant or intermittent
*   a mass or lump in the abdomen that can be felt by a healthcare provider
*   a feeling of fullness or pressure in the abdomen that does not go away
*   difficulty swallowing or eating due to a blockage in the digestive tract
*   jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes) due to a blockage in the bile ducts
*   ascites (fluid accumulation in the abdomen) which can cause abdominal swelling
*   bowel obstruction, which can cause vomiting, constipation, or diarrhea
*   respiratory symptoms, such as shortness of breath or coughing, due to a tumor pressing on the lungs or diaphragm
*   neurological symptoms, such as numbness, tingling, or weakness in the legs or feet, due to a tumor pressing on the spinal cord or nerves
*   changes in mental status, such as confusion, disorientation, or memory loss, due to a tumor pressing on the brain

**signs and symptoms related to specific areas of dissemination:**

*   **peritoneal dissemination:** a feeling of fullness or pressure in the abdomen, abdominal pain or discomfort, and ascites
*   **omentum and mesentery dissemination:** a feeling of fullness or pressure in the upper abdomen, abdominal pain or discomfort, and changes in bowel habits
*   **lymph node dissemination:** swelling or tenderness in the groin or armpits, and fatigue or weakness
*   **liver dissemination:** jaundice, dark urine, and pale stools
*   **lung dissemination:** shortness of breath, coughing, and chest pain
*   **bone dissemination:** bone pain or tenderness, fatigue or weakness, and changes in bowel or bladder habits
*   **brain dissemination:** changes in mental status, such as confusion, disorientation, or memory loss, and seizures or weakness in the face or limbs

**it's essential to note that these signs and symptoms can also be caused by other conditions, and a diagnosis of ovarian cancer should only be made by a healthcare provider after a thorough evaluation and testing. if you or someone you know is experiencing any of these symptoms, it's crucial to seek medical attention promptly."

samples.prompt: Please provide a short, funny list of ways to pass time at work. End with the exact phrase Is there anything else I can help with?

Here are some humorous ways to pass time at work:

1. **Stare at the clock**: It's like a mesmerizing art piece, and you're the only one who truly understands its beauty.
2. **Play "Guess the Coworker's Lunch"**: Try to guess what's in your coworker's lunch without actually asking them. It's like a fun game of culinary charades.
3. **Create a fantasy world**: Imagine you're a brave knight, and your cubicle is a medieval castle. Your coworkers are your loyal subjects, and the copier is a magical printing press.
4. **Take a "walking meeting"**: Pretend you're on a nature walk, but you're actually just walking around the office to get some exercise.
5. **Practice your "work-from-home" face**: Perfect your "I'm working from home" expression, complete with a fake coffee cup and a "I'm on a conference call" nod.
6. **Play "Office Bingo"**: Create bingo cards with different office-related tasks (e.g., "Someone will ask you to do something at 3 PM") and see who can mark off all their squares first.
7. **Write a novel**: Start writing a bestselling novel, but only write it on a sticky note. It's like a literary experiment in minimalism.

Is there anything else I can help with?

kwargs.end_phrase: Is there anything else I can help with?

samples.prompt: Explain to me how to ride a bike like I am a kid. Also, do not include the keywords "slow", "like" and "kid".
samples.response:
Let's learn how to ride a bike. 

First, you need to wear a special helmet to keep your head safe. It's like wearing a superhero cape, but it protects your head instead of making you fly.

Next, you need to get on the bike. Stand over the bike with your feet shoulder-width apart, and grab the handlebars. Make sure you're holding them tightly, but not too tightly.

Now, put one foot on a pedal and push it down with your foot. This will make the bike move. Keep pushing the pedal down with one foot, and then bring the other foot up to the other pedal. Keep doing this, and the bike will start moving.

As you get more comfortable, you can start pedaling with both feet at the same time. Remember to keep your balance by leaning a little bit to one side. If you feel like you're going to fall, don't worry! Just lean the other way, and you'll be okay.

To stop the bike, you need to use the brakes. There are two brakes on the bike, one on the front and one on the back. To use the brakes, squeeze the lever on the handlebars. This will make the bike stop.

Remember, practice makes perfect. Don't be afraid to fall – it's all part of learning. And always wear your helmet to stay safe.

samples.prompt: Can you tell me why there are oval race tracks in the desert? Please rewrite the answer to make it more concise and include the word "desert" in the answer. Make sure the answer contains exactly 3 bullet points in markdown format.
samples.response:
The oval-shaped race tracks in the desert, such as the famous Las Vegas Motor Speedway, were built to accommodate high-speed racing. Here are three reasons why:

* **Safety**: Ovals allow for faster speeds and more efficient racing, reducing the risk of accidents and improving safety for drivers and spectators.
* **Aerodynamics**: The oval shape helps to reduce wind resistance, allowing cars to maintain high speeds and maintain control while racing.
* **Accessibility**: Ovals can be built in the desert, where land is often cheaper and more readily available, making it easier to construct and maintain large racing facilities.

samples.prompt:
Describe how to proof Cauchy–Schwarz inequality. Make sure your ENTIRE response is in only the Marathi language, no other languages allowed. Do not write long equations. Your response must be in the following exact format, and use *** as the section separator:

[Section 1: Description of Cauchy–Schwarz inequality, in Marathi language]
***
[Section 2: Describe how to proof Cauchy–Schwarz inequality, in Marathi language, without equations]
***
[Section 3: Brief summary, in Marathi language]
samples.response:
[Section 1: Cauchy–Schwarz inequality description]
Cauchy–Schwarz inequality हे एक महत्वाची गणितीय अस्तित्व आहे जे दोन वेगळ्या वेक्टर्सच्या अंतर्निहित असताना त्यांच्या अंतर्निहित आणि त्यांच्या लांबी यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधात असते. हे असे म्हणता येईल की कोणत्याही दोन वेगळ्या वेक्टर्स a आणि b, ज्यांच्या अंतर्निहित आणि लांबी हे c आणि d असतील, त्यांच्या अंतर्निहिताच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधात असते.

***
[Section 2: Cauchy–Schwarz inequality proof]
Cauchy–Schwarz inequality ची पूर्वकथा करण्यासाठी, आपण एक वेगळी वेक्टर्स a आणि b घेऊया. त्यांच्या अंतर्निहिताच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधाचे स्पष्टीकरण करण्यासाठी आपण एक वेगळी वेक्टर्स u घेऊया जी a आणि b यांच्या अंतर्निहिताच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधाच्या समान असते. त्यामुळे आपण u = ka असे म्हणू शकतो. त्यामुळे a आणि b यांच्या अंतर्निहिताच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधाचे स्पष्टीकरण होते.

***
[Section 3: Cauchy–Schwarz inequality summary]
Cauchy–Schwarz inequality हे दोन वेगळ्या वेक्टर्सच्या अंतर्निहित आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधात असते. हे असे म्हणता येईल की कोणत्याही दोन वेगळ्या वेक्टर्स a आणि b, ज्यांच्या अंतर्निहित आणि लांबी हे c आणि d असतील, त्यांच्या अंतर्निहिताच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या आणि त्यांच्या लांबीच्या वर्गाच्या संख्या यांच्या गुणोत्तराच्या संबंधात असते. हे असे म्हणता येईल की (a · b)² ≤ (a · a) (b · b).

I hope this letter finds you all doing well and not too exhausted from all the homework and tests. As your school's resident "Lunch Lady" (just kidding, I'm actually the school counselor), I wanted to take a moment to talk to you about something very important: the cafeteria food.
